overview: Known for leaving no stone unturned, especially within his own life and family, Titus takes you on a comedic ride that will make you think, and leave you exhausted from laughter. To see one of Christopher Titus' shows, is to love him. Filmed at the historic El Portal Theater in North Hollywood, CA, Titus performed his tenth special, â€œZero Side Effects," to a sold out crowd, where he took on topics like White Supremacy, he apologizes to Millenials and Gen Z, and he recounts in painful detail, his life-altering near-death dental experience, in the way only Titus can.
title: Christopher Titus: Zero Side Effects
